TextString.Name: AvatarExecutiveString
TextString.String: You are the Executive Chef in this Restaurant.

TextString.Name: MultipleRestaurantsDecisionDescription
TextString.String: Once you'll be popular enough, the City Mayor will allow you to have more than one Restaurant and start creating your own Empire of Food!

TextString.Name: MoveRestaurantDesc
TextString.String: Leave the current Restaurant and move to a new one, keeping your staff and selling your furniture.

TextString.Name: NewRestaurantDesc
TextString.String:
Open a new place while leaving the current Restaurant in the hands of an Executive Chef.
This option will unlock once you gained enough Popularity.

TextString.Name: ExecCurrentLevelDesc
TextString.String: Executive Chefs will acquire experience at the end of the day and will eventually level up. They reach their maximum capabilities at level 3.

TextString.Name: EndDayMoraleSimulatedString
TextString.String:
Morale change in this Restaurant are based on your performances before leaving it.
In case of Morale losses, you can switch back to this Restaurant and prevent income penalties do to the Staff's low Morale

TextString.Name: MissingExecDesc
TextString.String: This Restaurant has no Executive Chef, meaning it will severely underperform unless you hire one in the Restaurants Panel.

TextString.Name: RestLowMorDesc
TextString.String: One or more Staff Members in this Restaurant have a low Morale and they will negatively affect the overall performances unless you go back to the place and fix the issue.

TextString.Name: ExecLevelsDesc
TextString.String: Executive Chefs improve their skills over time up to two time. Each day of employment gives them a single Skill Point, they need 10 to reach level 2 and another 20 to reach level 3.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveMultiplyPeople10String
TextString.String: +5% Customers visiting the Restaurant every day.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveMultiplyPeople20String
TextString.String: +7.5% Customers visiting the Restaurant every day.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveMultiplyPeople30String
TextString.String: +10% Customers visiting the Restaurant every day.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveMultiplyExpense10String
TextString.String: +5% increased spending budget for all Customers.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveMultiplyExpense20String
TextString.String: +7.5% increased spending budget for all Customers.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveMultiplyExpense30String
TextString.String: +10% increased spending budget for all Customers.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveVegLevel1String
TextString.String: +5% Vegan and Vegetarians visiting the restaurant and +5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveVegLevel2String
TextString.String: +7.5% Vegan and Vegetarians visiting the restaurant and +7.5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveVegLevel3String
TextString.String: +10% Vegan and Vegetarians visiting the restaurant and +10% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveWorkersLevel1String
TextString.String: +5% Workers visiting the restaurant and +5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveWorkersLevel3String
TextString.String: +7.5% Workers visiting the restaurant and +7.5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveWorkersLevel3String
TextString.String: +10% Workers visiting the restaurant and +10% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveFoodiesLevel1String
TextString.String: +5% Food Enthusiasts and Gourmets visiting the restaurant and +5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveFoodiesLevel2String
TextString.String: +7.5% Food Enthusiasts and Gourmets visiting the restaurant and +7.5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveFoodiesLevel3String
TextString.String: +10% Food Enthusiasts and Gourmets visiting the restaurant and +10% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveFamiliesLevel1String
TextString.String: +5% Families visiting the restaurant and +5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveFamiliesLevel2String
TextString.String: +7.5% Families visiting the restaurant and +7.5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveFamiliesLevel3String
TextString.String: +10% Families visiting the restaurant and +10% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveTouristLevel1String
TextString.String: +5% Tourists visiting the restaurant and +5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveTouristLevel2String
TextString.String: +7.5% Tourists visiting the restaurant and +7.5% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: ExecutiveTouristLevel3String
TextString.String: +10% Tourists visiting the restaurant and +10% increased budget for them.

TextString.Name: CloseRestaurantDesc
TextString.String: By toggling on this option, this Restaurant will be closed at the end of the day, freeing up its Influence Area on the Map. You can't close the Restaurant you are currently managing.

TextString.Name: MoveRestaurantAlertDescription
TextString.String: At the end of the day you will abandon the current Restaurant and move with your staff to a new one. To cancel this decision, click here to open the Map Panel.

TextString.Name: RentNewRestaurantAlertDescription
TextString.String: At the end of the day you will leave this Restaurant and open an additional one. You will be able to come back to this Restaurant in the future, and its performances will be simulated in the background. To cancel this decision, click here to open the Map Panel.

TextString.Name: DynamicPerkAlcoholOfferDescription
TextString.String:
Your Restaurant offers a decent choice of alcoholic beverages.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: DynamicPerkAlcoholSelectionDescription
TextString.String:
Your Restaurant offers a wide selection of alcoholic beverages.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PerkMicrowaveDescription
TextString.String:
Reduces the Cooking Time and the Recipe's Quality at the same time. Doesn't stack.
{MODIFIERS}

TextString.Name: PerkCoffeeMachineDescription
TextString.String:
Improves the Quality of all non-alcoholic Beverages. Doesn't stack.
{MODIFIERS}
